description:
Ren and Kazuma`s strict father. Though he is responsible for banishing Kazuma from the Kannagi family, he only wanted his son to find his own path.
Genma is the strongest En-Jutsushi of the Kannagi`s, and wields the blue God Flame, Shinen, which only eleven others have wielded since the founding of the clan. (Source: Wikipedia)
name: Kannagi Genma
